verses.verse: <S%G1894>When<s%> He had <S%G4137>completed<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> His <S%G4487>discourse<s%> in the <S%G189>hearing<s%> of the <S%G2992>people,<s%> He <S%G1525>went<s%> to <S%G2746>Capernaum.<s%>
And a <S%G5100>certain<s%> centurion's <S%G1401>slave,<s%> <S%G3739>who<s%> was <S%G1784>highly<s%> <S%G1784>regarded<s%> by him, was <S%G2560>sick<s%> and <S%G3195>about<s%> to <S%G5053>die.<s%>

And when he <S%G191>heard<s%> <S%G4012>about<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus,<s%> he <S%G649>sent<s%> some <S%G2453>Jewish<s%> <S%G4245>elders<s%> <S%G2065>asking<s%> Him to <S%G2064>come<s%> and <S%G1295>save<s%> the <S%G1295>life<s%> of his <S%G1401>slave.<s%>

And when they had <S%G3854>come<s%> to <S%G2424>Jesus,<s%> they <S%G4709>earnestly<s%> <S%G3870>entreated<s%> Him, <S%G3004>saying,<s%> "He is <S%G514>worthy<s%> for You to <S%G3930>grant<s%> <S%G3778>this<s%> to him;
for he <S%G25>loves<s%> our <S%G1484>nation,<s%> and it was he who <S%G3618>built<s%> us our <S%G4864>synagogue.<s%> "

<S%G1161>Now<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> [started] on His <S%G4198>way<s%> with them; and when He was <S%G2235>already<s%> not <S%G3112>far<s%> from the <S%G3614>house,<s%> the <S%G1543>centurion<s%> <S%G3992>sent<s%> <S%G5384>friends,<s%> <S%G3004>saying<s%> to Him, <S%G2962>"Lord,<s%> do not <S%G4660>trouble<s%> Yourself further, for I <S%G1510>am<s%> not <S%G2425>worthy<s%> for You to <S%G1525>come<s%> <S%G5259>under<s%> my <S%G4721>roof;<s%>

for <S%G1352>this<s%> <S%G1352>reason<s%> I did not <S%G3761>even<s%> <S%G515>consider<s%> <S%G1683>myself<s%> <S%G515>worthy<s%> to <S%G2064>come<s%> to You, but [just] <S%G3004>say<s%> the <S%G3056>word,<s%> and my <S%G3816>servant<s%> will be <S%G2390>healed.<s%>

"For I, <S%G2532>too,<s%> <S%G1510>am<s%> a <S%G444>man<s%> <S%G5259>under<s%> <S%G1849>authority,<s%> with <S%G4757>soldiers<s%> <S%G5259>under<s%> me; and I <S%G3004>say<s%> to <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G3778>one,<s%> <S%G4198>'Go!<s%>' and he <S%G4198>goes;<s%> and to <S%G243>another,<s%> <S%G2064>'Come!<s%>' and he <S%G2064>comes;<s%> and to my <S%G1401>slave,<s%> <S%G4160>'Do<s%> <S%G3778>this!<s%>' and he <S%G4160>does<s%> it."

<S%G1161>Now<s%> when <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G191>heard<s%> <S%G3778>this,<s%> He <S%G2296>marveled<s%> at him, and <S%G4762>turned<s%> and <S%G3004>said<s%> to the <S%G3793>multitude<s%> that was <S%G190>following<s%> Him, "I <S%G3004>say<s%> to you, not <S%G3761>even<s%> in <S%G2474>Israel<s%> have I <S%G2147>found<s%> <S%G5118>such<s%> <S%G5118>great<s%> <S%G4102>faith.<s%>"
And when <S%G3588>those<s%> who had been <S%G3992>sent<s%> <S%G5290>returned<s%> to the <S%G3624>house,<s%> they <S%G2147>found<s%> the <S%G1401>slave<s%> in <S%G5198>good<s%> <S%G5198>health.<s%>

And it <S%G1096>came<s%> about <S%G1836>soon<s%> <S%G1722>afterwards,<s%> <S%G1836><s%> that He <S%G4198>went<s%> to a <S%G4172>city<s%> <S%G2564>called<s%> <S%G3484>Nain;<s%> and His <S%G3101>disciples<s%> were <S%G4848>going<s%> <S%G4848>along<s%> with Him, <S%G2532>accompanied<s%> by a <S%G4183>large<s%> <S%G3793>multitude.<s%>

<S%G1161>Now<s%> as He <S%G1448>approached<s%> the <S%G4439>gate<s%> of the <S%G4172>city,<s%> <S%G2400>behold,<s%> a <S%G2348>dead<s%> man was being <S%G1580>carried<s%> out, the <S%G3439>only<s%> <S%G5207>son<s%> of his <S%G3384>mother,<s%> and she was a <S%G5503>widow;<s%> and a <S%G2425>sizeable<s%> <S%G3793>crowd<s%> from the <S%G4172>city<s%> was with her.
And when the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G3708>saw<s%> her, He <S%G4697>felt<s%> <S%G4697>compassion<s%> for her, and <S%G3004>said<s%> to her, "Do not weep2799."

And He <S%G4334>came<s%> up and <S%G681>touched<s%> the <S%G4673>coffin;<s%> and the <S%G941>bearers<s%> <S%G2476>came<s%> to a <S%G2476>halt.<s%> And He <S%G3004>said,<s%> <S%G3495>"Young<s%> <S%G3495>man,<s%> I <S%G3004>say<s%> to you, <S%G1453>arise!<s%>"
And the <S%G3498>dead<s%> <S%G3498>man<s%> <S%G339>sat<s%> up, and <S%G757>began<s%> to <S%G2980>speak.<s%> And [Jesus] <S%G1325>gave<s%> him back to his <S%G3384>mother.<s%>

And <S%G5401>fear<s%> <S%G2983>gripped<s%> them <S%G3956>all,<s%> and they [began] <S%G1392>glorifying<s%> <S%G2316>God,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> "A <S%G3173>great<s%> <S%G4396>prophet<s%> has <S%G1453>arisen<s%> <S%G1722>among<s%> us!" and, <S%G2316>"God<s%> has <S%G1980>visited<s%> His <S%G2992>people!<s%>"

And <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G3056>report<s%> <S%G4012>concerning<s%> Him <S%G1831>went<s%> out <S%G3650>all<s%> <S%G1722>over<s%> <S%G2453>Judea,<s%> and in <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G4066>surrounding<s%> <S%G4066>district.<s%>
And the <S%G3101>disciples<s%> of <S%G2491>John<s%> <S%G518>reported<s%> to him <S%G4012>about<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G3778>these<s%> <S%G3778>things.<s%>

And <S%G4341>summoning<s%> <S%G1417>two<s%> of his <S%G3101>disciples,<s%> <S%G2491>John<s%> <S%G3992>sent<s%> them to the <S%G2962>Lord,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> "Are You the <S%G2064>Expected<s%> One, <S%G2228>or<s%> do we <S%G4328>look<s%> for <S%G243>someone<s%> <S%G243>else<s%>?"

And when the <S%G435>men<s%> had <S%G3854>come<s%> to Him, they <S%G3004>said,<s%> <S%G2491>"John<s%> the <S%G910>Baptist<s%> has <S%G649>sent<s%> us to You, <S%G3004>saying,<s%> 'Are You the <S%G2064>Expected<s%> One, <S%G2228>or<s%> do we <S%G4328>look<s%> for <S%G243>someone<s%> <S%G243>else<s%>?'"

At that very <S%G5610>time<s%> He <S%G2323>cured<s%> <S%G4183>many<s%> [people] of <S%G3554>diseases<s%> and <S%G3148>afflictions<s%> and <S%G4190>evil<s%> <S%G4151>spirits;<s%> and He <S%G5483>granted<s%> <S%G991>sight<s%> to <S%G4183>many<s%> [who were] <S%G5185>blind.<s%>

And He <S%G611>answered<s%> and <S%G3004>said<s%> to them, <S%G4198>"Go<s%> and <S%G518>report<s%> to <S%G2491>John<s%> <S%G3739>what<s%> you have <S%G3708>seen<s%> and <S%G191>heard:<s%> [the] <S%G5185>blind<s%> <S%G308>receive<s%> <S%G308>sight,<s%> [the] <S%G5560>lame<s%> <S%G4043>walk,<s%> [the] <S%G3015>lepers<s%> are <S%G2511>cleansed,<s%> and [the] <S%G2974>deaf<s%> <S%G191>hear,<s%> [the] <S%G3498>dead<s%> are <S%G1453>raised<s%> up, [the] <S%G4434>poor<s%> have the <S%G2097>gospel<s%> <S%G2097>preached<s%> to them.
"And <S%G3107>blessed<s%> is he <S%G3739>who<s%> <S%G3361>keeps<s%> from <S%G4624>stumbling<s%> <S%G1722>over<s%> Me."

And when the <S%G32>messengers<s%> of <S%G2491>John<s%> had <S%G565>left,<s%> He <S%G757>began<s%> to <S%G3004>speak<s%> to the <S%G3793>multitudes<s%> <S%G4012>about<s%> <S%G2491>John,<s%> <S%G5101>"What<s%> did you <S%G1831>go<s%> out into the <S%G2048>wilderness<s%> to <S%G2300>look<s%> at? A <S%G2563>reed<s%> <S%G4531>shaken<s%> by the <S%G417>wind<s%>?

"But <S%G5101>what<s%> did you <S%G1831>go<s%> out to <S%G3708>see<s%>? A <S%G444>man<s%> <S%G294>dressed<s%> in <S%G3120>soft<s%> <S%G2440>clothing<s%>? <S%G2400>Behold,<s%> <S%G3588>those<s%> who are <S%G1741>splendidly<s%> <S%G2441>clothed<s%> and <S%G5225>live<s%> in <S%G5172>luxury<s%> are [found] in <S%G934>royal<s%> <S%G933>palaces.<s%>

"But <S%G5101>what<s%> did you <S%G1831>go<s%> out to <S%G3708>see<s%>? A <S%G4396>prophet<s%>? <S%G3483>Yes,<s%> I <S%G3004>say<s%> to you, and one who is <S%G4053>more<s%> than a <S%G4396>prophet.<s%>

<S%G3778>"This<s%> is the one <S%G4012>about<s%> <S%G3739>whom<s%> it is <S%G1125>written,<s%> <S%G2400>'Behold,<s%> I <S%G649>send<s%> My <S%G32>messenger<s%> <S%G4253>before<s%> Your <S%G4383>face,<s%> <S%G3739>Who<s%> will <S%G2680>prepare<s%> Your <S%G3598>way<s%> <S%G1715>before<s%> You.'

" I <S%G3004>say<s%> to you, <S%G1722>among<s%> those <S%G1084>born<s%> of <S%G1135>women,<s%> there is <S%G3762>no<s%> <S%G3762>one<s%> <S%G3173>greater<s%> than <S%G2491>John;<s%> <S%G1161>yet<s%> he who is <S%G3398>least<s%> in the <S%G932>kingdom<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> is <S%G3173>greater<s%> than he."

And when <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G2992>people<s%> and the tax-gatherers <S%G191>heard<s%> [this,] they <S%G1344>acknowledged<s%> God's <S%G1344>justice,<s%> having been <S%G907>baptized<s%> with the <S%G908>baptism<s%> of <S%G2491>John.<s%>
But the <S%G5330>Pharisees<s%> and the <S%G3544>lawyers<s%> <S%G114>rejected<s%> God's <S%G1012>purpose<s%> for <S%G1438>themselves,<s%> not having been <S%G907>baptized<s%> by John.
"To <S%G5101>what<s%> <S%G3767>then<s%> shall I <S%G3666>compare<s%> the <S%G444>men<s%> of <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G1074>generation,<s%> and <S%G5101>what<s%> are they <S%G3664>like<s%>?

"They are <S%G3664>like<s%> <S%G3813>children<s%> who <S%G2521>sit<s%> in the <S%G58>market<s%> <S%G58>place<s%> and <S%G4377>call<s%> to <S%G240>one<s%> <S%G240>another;<s%> and they <S%G3004>say,<s%> 'We <S%G832>played<s%> the <S%G832>flute<s%> for you, and you did not <S%G3738>dance;<s%> we <S%G2354>sang<s%> a <S%G2354>dirge,<s%> and you did not <S%G2799>weep.<s%>'

" For <S%G2491>John<s%> the <S%G910>Baptist<s%> has <S%G2064>come<s%> <S%G2068>eating<s%> <S%G3361>no<s%> <S%G740>bread<s%> and <S%G4095>drinking<s%> <S%G3383>no<s%> <S%G3631>wine;<s%> and you <S%G3004>say,<s%> 'He <S%G2192>has<s%> a <S%G1140>demon!<s%>'

"The <S%G5207>Son<s%> of <S%G444>Man<s%> has <S%G2064>come<s%> <S%G2068>eating<s%> and <S%G4095>drinking;<s%> and you <S%G3004>say,<s%> <S%G2400>'Behold,<s%> a <S%G5314>gluttonous<s%> <S%G444>man,<s%> and a <S%G3630>drunkard,<s%> a <S%G5384>friend<s%> of tax-gatherers and <S%G268>sinners!<s%>'
<S%G2532>"Yet<s%> <S%G4678>wisdom<s%> is <S%G1344>vindicated<s%> by <S%G3956>all<s%> her <S%G5043>children.<s%>"

<S%G1161>Now<s%> <S%G5100>one<s%> of the <S%G5330>Pharisees<s%> was <S%G2065>requesting<s%> Him to <S%G2068>dine<s%> with him. And He <S%G1525>entered<s%> the Pharisee's <S%G3624>house,<s%> and <S%G2625>reclined<s%> [at the table.]

And <S%G2400>behold,<s%> there was a <S%G1135>woman<s%> in the <S%G4172>city<s%> <S%G3748>who<s%> was a <S%G268>sinner;<s%> and when she <S%G1921>learned<s%> that He was <S%G2621>reclining<s%> [at the table] in the Pharisee's <S%G3614>house,<s%> she <S%G2865>brought<s%> an <S%G211>alabaster<s%> <S%G211>vial<s%> of <S%G3464>perfume,<s%>

and <S%G2476>standing<s%> <S%G3694>behind<s%> [Him] at His <S%G4228>feet,<s%> <S%G2799>weeping,<s%> she <S%G757>began<s%> to <S%G1026>wet<s%> His <S%G4228>feet<s%> with her <S%G1144>tears,<s%> and kept <S%G1591>wiping<s%> them with the <S%G2359>hair<s%> of her <S%G2776>head,<s%> and <S%G2705>kissing<s%> His <S%G4228>feet,<s%> and <S%G218>anointing<s%> them with the <S%G3464>perfume.<s%>

<S%G1161>Now<s%> when the <S%G5330>Pharisee<s%> who had <S%G2564>invited<s%> Him <S%G3708>saw<s%> this, he <S%G3004>said<s%> to <S%G1438>himself,<s%> <S%G1487>"If<s%> <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G3778>man<s%> were a <S%G4396>prophet<s%> He would <S%G1097>know<s%> <S%G5101>who<s%> and <S%G4217>what<s%> <S%G4217>sort<s%> of <S%G4217>person<s%> <S%G3588>this<s%> <S%G1135>woman<s%> is <S%G3748>who<s%> is <S%G681>touching<s%> Him, that she is a <S%G268>sinner.<s%>"

And <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G611>answered<s%> and <S%G3004>said<s%> to him, <S%G4613>"Simon,<s%> I <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G5100>something<s%> to <S%G3004>say<s%> to you." And he <S%G5346>replied,<s%> <S%G3004>"Say<s%> it, <S%G1320>Teacher.<s%>"

"A <S%G5100>certain<s%> <S%G1157>moneylender<s%> <S%G1510>had<s%> <S%G1417>two<s%> <S%G5533>debtors:<s%> <S%G1520>one<s%> <S%G3784>owed<s%> <S%G4001>five<s%> <S%G4001>hundred<s%> <S%G1220>denarii,<s%> and the <S%G2087>other<s%> <S%G4004>fifty.<s%>

"When they were <S%G3361>unable<s%> <S%G2192><s%> to <S%G591>repay,<s%> he <S%G5483>graciously<s%> <S%G5483>forgave<s%> them <S%G297>both.<s%> <S%G5101>Which<s%> of them <S%G3767>therefore<s%> will <S%G25>love<s%> him <S%G4183>more<s%>?"

<S%G4613>Simon<s%> <S%G611>answered<s%> and <S%G3004>said,<s%> "I <S%G5274>suppose<s%> the one <S%G3739>whom<s%> he <S%G5483>forgave<s%> <S%G4183>more.<s%>" And He <S%G3004>said<s%> to him, "You have <S%G2919>judged<s%> <S%G3723>correctly.<s%>"

And <S%G4762>turning<s%> <S%G4314>toward<s%> the <S%G1135>woman,<s%> He <S%G5346>said<s%> to <S%G4613>Simon,<s%> "Do you <S%G991>see<s%> <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G1135>woman<s%>? I <S%G1525>entered<s%> your <S%G3614>house;<s%> you <S%G1325>gave<s%> Me <S%G3756>no<s%> <S%G5204>water<s%> for My <S%G4228>feet,<s%> but she has <S%G1026>wet<s%> My <S%G4228>feet<s%> with her <S%G1144>tears,<s%> and <S%G1591>wiped<s%> them with her <S%G2359>hair.<s%>
"You <S%G1325>gave<s%> Me <S%G3756>no<s%> <S%G5370>kiss;<s%> but she, <S%G575>since<s%> the time I <S%G1525>came<s%> in, has not <S%G1257>ceased<s%> to <S%G2705>kiss<s%> My <S%G4228>feet.<s%>
"You did not <S%G218>anoint<s%> My <S%G2776>head<s%> with <S%G1637>oil,<s%> but she <S%G218>anointed<s%> My <S%G4228>feet<s%> with <S%G3464>perfume.<s%>

" For <S%G3739>this<s%> <S%G5484>reason<s%> I <S%G3004>say<s%> to you, her <S%G266>sins,<s%> which are <S%G4183>many,<s%> have been <S%G863>forgiven,<s%> for she <S%G25>loved<s%> <S%G4183>much;<s%> but he <S%G3739>who<s%> is <S%G863>forgiven<s%> <S%G3641>little,<s%> <S%G25>loves<s%> <S%G3641>little.<s%>"
And He <S%G3004>said<s%> to her, "Your <S%G266>sins<s%> have been <S%G863>forgiven.<s%>"

And <S%G3588>those<s%> who were <S%G4873>reclining<s%> [at the table] with Him <S%G757>began<s%> to <S%G3004>say<s%> to <S%G1438>themselves,<s%> <S%G5101>"Who<s%> is <S%G3778>this<s%> [man] <S%G3739>who<s%> <S%G2532>even<s%> <S%G863>forgives<s%> <S%G266>sins<s%>?"
And He <S%G3004>said<s%> to the <S%G1135>woman,<s%> "Your <S%G4102>faith<s%> has <S%G4982>saved<s%> you; <S%G4198>go<s%> in <S%G1515>peace.<s%>"
